text: <@U6GNQ7JBU> agreed.  I'm talking about being able to assign new labels to custom modules within a flexible column, i.e. if I'm building a "meet the team" page, I generally use a flexible column and end up with lots of custom modules within with the same name.  For ease of editing, it would be nice if I could re-name the module at the page level instead of ending up with 20 modules named "team member".
<@U54TVT3C1> <@U6GNQ7JBU> It is still funny that it wont work in a flex column and it wil outside of one.
but I digress. It still is a neat find.
Hey Guys.. Working in the new editor and i realized there isnt a hubl or custom html module.. What was the replacement?
I think the intention is for us to just use "modules" in those cases
Yeah. If I need just a bit of html I think it is a bit of overkill to make a whole new module.
